_sText: This is my first attempt at CS:S mapping that I have completed, so say what you will. I designed this map to try and train the player to shoot at the upper body and head more.  I made sure spawn killing is minimal/non-existent as well.  This map is simple, and everything is covered in glass.  It's sort of cool as it makes things look like they are floating a bit.  Oh yeah - the buyzone is on top of the box in the center.
